name: The replacement for Breakfast With Frost
reviewBody:
News 24 Sunday is the replacement show for the long running Breakfast With Frost which has finished.

The format is almost identical to Frost, with interviews with famous people, mostly politicians. The show includes a news summery, usually with Moria Stuart and a weather forecast too. There is also the reviews of the Sunday papers with guests.

This show is presented by newsreader Peter Sissons, who often stood in for David Frost on his show when he was away.

News 24 Sunday is usually on at the same time as Breakfast With Frost was.
